title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Motif Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Classic
materials: Blue Manikyas (Blue Mny: 3.20). Features a signature Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This stunning Haaram features a delicate floral motif, meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut diamonds. The center pendant showcases a vibrant, pear-shaped emerald framed by diamond petals, adding a touch of regal elegance. Delicate gold leaves intertwine throughout the necklace, creating a visual masterpiece. The use of rubies and blue manikyas add depth and richness to the design.
colors: with vibrant accents of ruby red
and a subtle hint of blue.
occasions: festive celebrations like Ugadi or Diwali
and milestone events like a half-saree function (Voni Function). Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for elegant parties and formal gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of precious gemstones and intricate design makes it a treasured heirloom. The use of ethically sourced materials and durable construction ensures lasting beauty. A perfect blend of traditional Telugu heritage and modern design, making it a versatile piece for any modern South Indian woman.
